channel.title: The ONLY Mac OSX Client for 508 Servers! (IP CHANGER)
channel.description:
[size=30pt]DO NOT FLAME ABOUT WHICH OPERATING SYSTEM IS BETTER! That's your opinion NOT mine, alright? [/size] I have worked on this one for a while, it's got 525 items hard-coded into it. I also added an IP changer. The directories have been changed to match Mac Protocol, IT WILL NOT WORK WITH WINDOWS! The file size is 56MB, not too bad for a 508 client. Closed source sorry, leechers. :P Here are some pictures: [IMG]http://i35.tinypic.com/2gya7t2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/2lm6n28.png[/img] [IMG]http://i35.tinypic.com/2chxo4n.png[/img]
[size=16pt]Here are the new item codes: [b]Dragon Claws[/b] - 3101 [b]Dragon Platebody[/b] - 1125 [b]Twin Swords[/b] - 1231 [b]Spirit Shield[/b] - 1189 [b]Spectral Spirit Shield[/b] - 1193 [b]Death Cape[/b] - 4353 [b]Statius's Warhammer[/b] - 1337 [b]Vesta's Longsword[/b] - 1203 [b]Staff Cape[/b] - 4331 [b]Elysian Spirit Shield[/b] - 1191 [b]Arcane Spirit Shield[/b] - 1197 [b]Blessed Spirit Sheild[/b] - 1195 [b]Glock[/b] - 841[/size]
[b]Download:[/b] [url=http://uppit.com/v/XZFPIE1G]http://uppit.com/v/XZFPIE1G[/url]

item.title: The ONLY Mac OSX Client for 508 Servers! (IP CHANGER)
item.dc:creator: @dylanmbp dylanmbp
item.description:
@dylanmbp wrote:

So I downloaded it and I ran Run #508. It opened up terminal and then the client but it’s stuck on Connecting to update server. Did I do something wrong? I really want to play because the Moparscape client kept crashing when I tried moving. I’m a noob when it comes to computer stuff so If something could explain what I’m doing wrong that would be great.

Read full topic

item.title: The ONLY Mac OSX Client for 508 Servers! (IP CHANGER)
item.dc:creator: @Poolix Poolix
item.description:
@Poolix wrote:

[quote=“a Super Man, post:126, topic:305817”]WTF is all your problems?

ALL SERVERS WORK ON MAC!

You just gotta create the SH files yourself, because most DO NOT come with SH files.

I created the proper SH files and it worked on mine! COMPILE+RUN WORKED ON MY MAC. SO STFU ABOUT MAKING OPEN SOURCE MAC SERVERS! YOU CAN USE PALADINO76, DAVIDSCAPE, ESPEON, EVERYTHING CAN BE RUN ON MAC.

YOU CAN GET HD ON MAC IF YOU FIND THE PROPER LIBJOGL FILES. (Which is what I’m doing right now, I’m going to force all mac users to play my game with a closed-source non-ip changer client)[/quote]
How do you make the SH files for Davidscape, thats the only one i want. thaaaankss.

Read full topic

item.title: The ONLY Mac OSX Client for 508 Servers! (IP CHANGER)
item.dc:creator: @a_Super_Man a Super Man
item.description:
@a_Super_Man wrote:

WTF is all your problems?

ALL SERVERS WORK ON MAC!

You just gotta create the SH files yourself, because most DO NOT come with SH files.

I created the proper SH files and it worked on mine! COMPILE+RUN WORKED ON MY MAC. SO STFU ABOUT MAKING OPEN SOURCE MAC SERVERS! YOU CAN USE PALADINO76, DAVIDSCAPE, ESPEON, EVERYTHING CAN BE RUN ON MAC.

YOU CAN GET HD ON MAC IF YOU FIND THE PROPER LIBJOGL FILES. (Which is what I’m doing right now, I’m going to force all mac users to play my game with a closed-source non-ip changer client)

item.title: The ONLY Mac OSX Client for 508 Servers! (IP CHANGER)
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:121, topic:305817”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=402045.msg3194435#msg3194435 date=1272643183]

Just saw this thread, but seeing as how it’s still active I’ll comment.

You have to be an idiot to make a mac only client, or even a windows only client. The client is written in Java, which means if you don’t screw it up it will run on all Operating Systems that can run a JVM. MoparScape for example is a single client and will run and has been tested by me on Linux, Mac OSX and Windows, 317 and 508 versions so far, many more to come.
[/quote]508 Clients do not work on Mac’s for some reason. JavaIsMyBitch made it work on Mac, and while I agree he should have made it compatable with both rather than just Mac’s, a lot of people were asking for it.

They do, I didn’t do anything special with the 508 in MoparScape 4.0 and it “just works” on macs. In fact runescape has always worked on macs, so if a runescape private server client doesn’t, then whoever wrote it actually BROKE it.[/quote]Idk who wrote it

Read full topic
item.source: The ONLY Mac OSX Client for 508 Servers! (IP CHANGER)

item.title: The ONLY Mac OSX Client for 508 Servers! (IP CHANGER)
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:120, topic:305817”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=402045.msg3194316#msg3194316 date=1272614676]
Just saw this thread, but seeing as how it’s still active I’ll comment.

You have to be an idiot to make a mac only client, or even a windows only client. The client is written in Java, which means if you don’t screw it up it will run on all Operating Systems that can run a JVM. MoparScape for example is a single client and will run and has been tested by me on Linux, Mac OSX and Windows, 317 and 508 versions so far, many more to come.
[/quote]508 Clients do not work on Mac’s for some reason. JavaIsMyBitch made it work on Mac, and while I agree he should have made it compatable with both rather than just Mac’s, a lot of people were asking for it.[/quote]

They do, I didn’t do anything special with the 508 in MoparScape 4.0 and it “just works” on macs. In fact runescape has always worked on macs, so if a runescape private server client doesn’t, then whoever wrote it actually BROKE it.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Edp32281 Edp32281
item.description:
@Edp32281 wrote:

hey i downloaded this client and when i run it this pops up
Last login: Thu Feb 11 19:54:55 on ttys000
/Users/Matt/Desktop/MacOSX508Client/Run\ #508 ; exit;
Macintosh:~ Matt$ /Users/Matt/Desktop/MacOSX508Client/Run\ #508 ; exit;
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: Bad version number in .class file
at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(ClassLoader.java:676)
at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(SecureClassLoader.java:124)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(URLClassLoader.java:260)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$100(URLClassLoader.java:56)
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:195)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:188)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:317)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:280)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:252)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(ClassLoader.java:375)
logout

[Process completed]

and thats it nothing else happens the client doesnt actually pop up

Read full topic

I noticed it was trying to open User/ItDidn’tSayMyNameHere/Desktop yadayadayada. So I attempted to change it to my name, and I’m pretty sure I did it right. It still doesn’t work, and I was hoping someone could help.[/quote]The compiler is useless to you because there is no .Java files in the client. The compiler is what I used when I was coding. I forgot to delete it.
